MOBILE
+84 932 924 523 
EMAIL
trevorza@gmail.com
TREVOR LEWIS
SKYPE trevor-lewis S
Product Manager / BDM
ZALO trevor_lewis Z
COVER LETTER
TO
RAPBANK
Tong 7, 27 Phó Đoc Chính, Quon 1, 
TP.HCM, Vietnam.
I hereby wish to submit my resume for your consideration for the position 
you recently advertised for Product Manager / Business Development.
This position is the perfect fit for me as I have a unique skill set 
that combines my love for both internet technology and business 
development covering product management, architectural planning, 
team leadership, and customer engagement. 
My entire career has been focused around IT Tech with particular focus on 
Web and App Production, Business and Digital Strategies, Development, 
Marketing and Support within the online ecosystem. I have a deep 
understanding and of the startup environment having experience as a co-
founder. I am hard-working, good  tempered and optimistic.
I am 100% capable and delivering on all the responsibilities you specified 
and some. My skills summary are as follows:
l 20 years’ working experience in the internet field as a Solution’s 
     Architect, Product Manager, Software Developer, and a Digital Marketer 
     skilled in analyzing, conceptualizing, and prototyping, project scoping, 
     road-mapping and project budgeting, UI/UX design, modeling, 
     integration, deployment as well as DBA, online security, customer 
     support and training 
l 15 years’ project and team leadership using Waterfall, Kanban and 
      Agile methodology approaches (iterative development)
l 10 years business processing, budgeting, IT policies and protocol 
      creation, product requirements and specifications.
l 5 years at a corporate leadership level and Startup experience 
l Strong business development skills, strategy and execution with high 
      CSAT levels
l In-depth knowledge of digital marketing, SEO, SMM, Google PPC, 
      Facebook Ads, and Audience Insights, content marketing and 
      production
l Highly capable of driving deals end to end from closure to execution 
      and maintain key relationships at senior level
l Understanding of tools such as GA, Woopra, MS Office, Adobe, InVision, 
      Sketch, Jira, Slack, Trello, etc.
My strong points include building and engineering IT systems with 
special focus on aesthetics, discussing and presenting technical functions 
to stakeholders, investors, and partners as well as supporting the 
development and marketing teams for which I am extremely comfortable 
with and am able to successfully execute upon.
I am passionate about building B2B and B2C products (especially in the 
FinTech Field) and have the knowledge and experience of many years of 
being in the digital environment. I am an out-the-box thinker, with the 
ability to innovate and create effective solutions with actionable results. I 
am an experienced team leader and manager.
Furthermore, I am based in Vietnam and have both a valid residence and 
working visa. I also have an excellent understanding of the Vietnamese 
market and culture and thus well-suited to work with Vietnamese 
companies and engineers. 
I trust my interest in this position allows me an opportunity to connect 
and engage with you further and I sincerely look forward to hearing back 
from you soon.
DATE
2 JULY 2019
FROM
Trevor Lewis
CHECKLIST
l Total Engineers managed at one time: 
      40 people 
l Team Communication and Collaboration: 
      International 
l Project Accountability: 
      Extensive Experience
l  Innovate-after-completion: 
      Solid Experience
l Reporting and Tracking: 
      Highly Experienced 
l  Language: 
      Native English 
l Second Language: 
      Afrikaans / Dutch 
l  Mindset: 
      Confident, Business-minded, 
      Self-Organised
l Project Management: 
      Over 15 years experience 
l Software Engineering: 
      20 years experience
Kind Regards,
TREVOR LEWIS
MOBILE
+84 932 924 523 
EMAIL
trevorza@gmail.com
TREVOR LEWIS
SKYPE trevor-lewis S
Product Manager / BDM
ZALO trevor_lewis Z
KEY ACHIEVEMENTS
1. I have been actively involved in the online / internet industry since 1995 
2. Created my first website for a small accounting firm in 1996
3. Secured my first big NGO project in 1997 where I worked closely with 
    the client to clarify their needs and define product sitemap. This was 
    the first time I provided Solution Architectural services on a large scale 
4. Defined, Designed, Developed, Marketed and Maintained 5 websites 
    for local Real Estate Agencies by the year 1999
5. Won my first big-budget Government project in 2000 were sat with a 
    a panel of department heads to define their needs and requirements 
    and then developed all designs. wireframes, mockups, and plans to 
    ensure project and solution would satisfy those needs
6. Worked with several governmental departments to produce large 
    online websites, intranets and internal software to service their needs. 
    Here I worked with and collaborated with their project managers and 
    team members (2001 to 2003)
7. Firmly established my own Digital Solutions and Media firm by 2004, 
    hired and managed a team of 10+ engineers, product managers, and 
    designers. Prepared quotes, project scope and deliverables for clients
8. Worked with international teams, delivering on international projects 
    to over 24 countries, calculated budgets for various projects including 
    time frames, and ensured adherence to deliverables were implemented
8. By 2009, I designed, developed and marketed the leading UAE portal; 
    Dubizzle.com which later sold for $40m to OLX
9. From 2010 to 2013 I worked in several countries on several projects as 
    a Project Manager and interim CTO. I provided the needed engineering, 
    architectural guidance, team management which ensured all processes 
    and teams were in place and all tasks were being executed correctly
10. Moved to Singapore as Head of IT for an International Investment 
      company where I managed all their online development, design, 
      digital marketing, and project management needs, often delegating 
      responsibilities and prioritising assignments to our development staff
11. 2015 to 2017 entered the startup Tech World where I provided 
     leadership and management for several businesses in the PropTech, 
     EduTech, Recruitment, and FinTech world
12. In 2018, I raised $100k in VC for my own RealTech startup with a staff 
     count of 40 engineers
MANAGEMENT AND PROCESS SERVICES  
l IT Project Management and Business Setup, 
      Administration and Operations
l Technical Lead, Team Building and Team Management  
l Business and Client Analyses, Strategic Technical 
      Planning & Development 
l Solutions Architecture, Solution’s Development 
      and Road Map Planning 
l Project Engineering and Software Development, 
      Vendor Selection  
l Quality Assurance, sales and marketing team 
      management & collaboration  
l Waterfall, Kanban, and Agile Methodologies  
l Technical Writing, Spec Sheets, Scoping, Help 
      Documentation 
l Presentation Development and Delivery, 
      Technical Solutions Development 
l Skills Transfer, Training and Teaching, Technical 
      Support, Business Processes 
l Networking, Strategic Partnership, and 
      Relationship Building 
l Technical architecture planning and maintenance 
      and IT Skill Management 
l Customer and Investor Communications, 
      Development Processes
l Financial Planning, Strategy Development and 
      Communications
l Recruitment, Skills Acquisition, IT Outsource 
      Execution, Staff Recruitment
l Business Meetings, Investor Relations, Start-up 
      Setup, and Execution 
SOFTWARE SKILLS  
l Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Premiere, 
      Dreamweaver, Flash, Audition, XD
l Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Publisher, Project, 
      Outlook
l InVision, Sketch
l Slack, Trello, Atlassian Jira
l Nibbler, Google Analytics, Hotjar, CrazyEgg, Woopra
l Zoho CRM, Freshdesk, Salesforce, Pipedrive, Highrise
l Help desk support, knowledge base upkeep, 
       ticketing system (ZenDesk, FreshDesk, Atlassian, 
       Interkom, Drift, etc.)
PROGRAMMING SKILLS
l Cobol, RPG, Fortran
l Basic, Turbo Pascal, Visual Basic, .NET, C#
l JavaScript,  HTML5, CSS3, AngularJS
l ASP, PHP, Python, MS-SQL, MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL
l Laravel, Bootstrap, Django 
l React, Node.js, Xcode Swift, Android Kotlin & RESTful API
l Microsoft IIS, Linux Apache, CPanel, Plesk, MySQL, MSSQL 
DIGITAL MARKETING SKILLS  
l SEO, SEM, Social Media Marketing
l Content and Video Creation
l E-marketing & Lead Management
TREVOR LEWIS
MOBILE

RESUME
PROFILE SKILL
I have over 20 years of international working and industry experience in the 
field of Information Technology within the Internet field with excellent 
Product Management and Business Development skills. I combined these 
skills with the love of IT and passion for Web / App Production by devel-
oping and designing several online systems with a proven track record in 
managing, engineering, and implementing projects with a variety of teams.
REFERENCES
